specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: The PI Series Solid Oak Bench, available in 120, 140, and 160 cm lengths, brings a modern and natural touch to your living spaces. Crafted from elegant solid oak wood, this modern and aesthetically refined bench is an ideal choice for creating a functional seating area. Its versatile design allows it to be used in various settings, such as bedroom ends, dressing rooms, entryways, or along walls, offering both decorative and practical functionality. The PI Scandinavian Handcrafted Bench showcases natural wood characteristics, including fine cracks and unique grain patterns, making each piece one of a kind. A water-based matte varnish enhances the surface, providing protection against scratches, stains, and wear over time. Handcrafted with attention to detail, this durable and elegant solid oak bench features a minimalist design, adding a sense of sophistication to any space.
